basics.name: Sam Safaei
basics.label: Sr. Embedded Software Engineer
basics.summary: Senior Embedded Software Engineer with 15+ years of experience developing firmware and embedded systems for automotive, IoT, and telecommunications platforms. Proven expertise in C/C++ programming, Embedded Linux development, AUTOSAR, and real-time systems. Strong track record of driving embedded software architecture, implementing CI/CD processes, and delivering production-ready solutions for autonomous vehicles, fleet management systems, and mobile network infrastructure. Adept at hardware-software integration, low-level protocol implementation, and optimizing system performance for resource-constrained environments.
